title: Very Good Freemium
text:
I’ve played this game for many years, and it’s always been my favourite of its type. The gameplay is tight and it’s nice and colourful. 

I’ve always been one of those people who watches the ads to get free stuff, and there was a point where you were able to watch an infinite amount of them. Helps you guys, helps me, right? Well, whatever service you’re using now is running out of ads, and that’s no fun for either side of the equation.

You guys are also pretty good about this, but I wish the key spawn rate would go up after a certain point. I know that you’re meant to buy them, but I feel like when you’ve been on a run for a full 15 minutes or longer, you should get some sort of congrats.

I also feel like you should be able to get the new “special” characters and “special” boards without paying money if you have enough keys or something. The “add plus 5 to your multiplier with this character” Thursdays and nothing Wednesdays are really lame, in my opinion. Maybe you could change it so you can pay for the “add plus 5 to your multiplier with this character” characters with, say, 30 keys. That would work with the current key economy you guys have set up. Or you could set it up so Facebook-connected people can do that as a further reward.

title: Very faulty game and time waster
text: I played 1 game for 35 minutes straight and got a new high score. I spent almost half of my device’s battery and was glued to the game for soo long. At the end, I died so I clicked watch a free video to revive again. The video glitched and the screen went black. I waited for 7 minutes for it to come back but it didn’t. I had to restart the app. But when I did my high score wasn’t saved and all the coins and mystery boxes. Got on the way weren’t given to me at all!!!!!! And guess what?? I used 6 keys during the game to revive twice, and they WERE taken from me. OUT OF ALL THE THINGS THEY ONLY TOOK MY KEYS!! I swear I will sue the creator of this game. He is wasting our time and effort. This app deserves 0 STARS!!! It’s terrible. Hey Killow, you better give me what I deserve, like the coins and mystery boxes and my keys back. I’ll be waiting for a response from you. 😠😡 the frickin developer is only responding to the good reviews. HEY! Why don’t you take a stand for once and solve the infinite problems your stupid game has!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! You don’t deserve anything!!!!!!

title: Great But Needs Improvement
text: I honestly love this game and loved playing it as a child, there are some issues though. 1.) Why everything is so expensive with coins. 2.) I don’t understand why you always have to give the badges and the shoes, they aren’t the best. 3.) How come when you give us a prize, we never actually we need in the moment, if we’re in a coin “mine” a magnet is what we hope for and want. 4.) Are we able to get better prizes other than shoes and badges. 5.) What the heck does the badge do, it confuses me all the time. 6.) How come if we get three are to mystery boxes on the run we can only open one mystery box? And finally, 7.) please improve this game and listen to the reviews. We would really enjoy if you changed the game up a little bit and listened to our suggestions. Thank you and totally would recommend purchasing this app to anyone.

title: Issues....
text: I love this game I really do, I like the competitions and the word hunts and the missions but the game needs some work. Problem 1 - The Missions: The missions are mostly simple, sometimes they are challenging the problem is there are some missions that are IMPOSSIBLE i.e. “Collect 3 Keys in one run” “Collect 4 Power Jumpers in one run” seems simple enough but I have only gotten maybe two keys the entire time I’ve played this game via run and it seems when you get a mission for power jumper collections or something else you get NONE. I have done 16 runs in a row and have only obtained one. Shouldn’t have to skip missions like that. Problem 2 - Glitching: when you get pretty far in a run, the game glitches. One minute you’ll be hopping trains on a board with 500,000+ points and a split second later you’ll be in a different area with the guard shaking the life out of you. So you have two options, spend precious keys to keep playing or end the run because of a glitch. Not cool.

title: Fun, Addictive, Everything I Wanted
text:
I know you’re reading the title and thinking, “Oh, wow, she gave it 5 stars, she isn’t going to complain about anything ”- WRONG!
You see, this game has been out since the early to late 2000s, I’ve been playing this game since I was a kid. There have been a lot of updates to the game from when I was 6 (iPads probably didn’t exist when I was 6). 
But, what I can’t figure out is, in the App Store it says the game is free- when I clicked to get it , it said I’ll have to PAY to get it. So, why mark it as “free” when it clearly isn’t!? I’d rather watch any amount of ads than use (and probably waste) my real-life money! It’s also a little laggy but it’ll get used to you playing it, and it’ll stop. If you run into something, and it’s game-over , it’ll give you the option to either watch an ad or use one of your keys to revive. If you don’t want to revive, you have to wait.
HOW HARD IS IT TO ADD A “No thanks!” BUTTON, THAN TO GO THROUGH 10 SECONDS OF BOREDOM!!!?? I recently found out that you can just tap the screen and it goes away, but a “No thanks!” button would be helpful for all of the newbies who haven’t figured that out yet.
Anyways, I can see why this game deserves 5 stars. It’s amazing 😉 
Good job, creators!👍🏻

title: My Childhood Game
text:
“Subway Surfers” was introduced to me by my older cousin when I was four or five. I would play it almost non-stop. I loved trying to get the highest scored I could and running away from a fat guy and a dog. I didn’t have friends as a kid, so when I went outside it was with my dad. I remember sometimes saying, “Hey, daddy? Can we play Subway Surfers?” He asked, “What’s that?” So I explained it to him. I would run around the yard while he chased me. And when I fell over or slowed down he’s tackle me, just like in the game. 

This game was recently suggested to me by the App Store, and I couldn’t help but decide to get it again. My favorite character was always Lucy, and she still is! I’m probably using her right now. I love this game so much and I recommend it to all people of all ages :)

title: Could've been one of the best runner apps...
text:
I loved Subway Surfers back in 2014. (at least I think that's when I started playing it)
I recently came back to it for nostalgia and I'm quite upset. I had SO MANY exclusive characters and boards and guess what? It didn't save that I bought them. I thought connecting to Facebook would've saved my progress but it didn't. I had the exclusive elf tricky and everything. The only thing that stayed was my highscore. Even my maxed out multiplyer was gone and now I have to redo EVERYTHING.
Moving on from that, everything is unreasonable pricey for a game that's buggy. There would be times I HAVE to pull out a board while playing because a train would be coming from all three of the lanes. Plus it's super laggy.
It would be so much better if my purchases and progress has saved and if everything wasn't pricey. 
I don't know why I liked this app so much when I was younger lol.

title: Awesome Game! Minor changes can be made!
text: hi! Subway surfers is a really fun game.I enjoy playing it when I have no Wi-Fi or going on a road trip. It can be very useful when you are bored or have nothing to do. One thing that I would change is that there should be less advertisements. Subway surfers has been around for a long time. and I’ve played it most of my childhood. there are minor bugs in the game, but I guess that doesn’t really matter since they update so soon and so quickly. I would definitely recommend this game to people of all age, but some advertisements are not appropriate for little kids. I’ve seen other reviews were people are talking about being able to customize your own character or adding new characters, which I would honestly enjoy! Thanks for reading this:-) ❤️

title: Game Center
text:
I like the game, but please stop signing me into Game Center without my knowledge.  This applies to Subway Surfers and other games that I have downloaded.  I get signed in when I restart my phone, and even when I have no games installed.

Also, why do you have my payment method tied to Apple Music?  In iOS 16.1.2, it is not possible to add a payment method without having Apple Music installed on your phone.

I’m entering this information here because Apple doesn’t allow feedback by any other method, and if they did, nothing would be done about it.   People complain about Google’s pervasiveness; Apple is just as bad if not worse.  At least Google Play is up front about what they do with the data they collect when you play a game.  I apologize for the rant, but I’m totally fed up with this App Store and the Game Center.

title: Subway Surfers For The Win!
text: My siblings and I were all addicted to this app for more than three years but we dropped it as it got old. We somehow got my mother’s facebook account to be on the lead boards for the British Subway community! I never thought I’d download it again, but after watching the animated series, I got excited and did so. I’m honestly so happy for this app and hope it goes a long way. I hope all its developers and everyone who was ever a part in producing this amazing game watches it grow big again. It deserves all the attention it’s starting to gain again and I can’t wait for it to become the number #1 game on the appstore. The animated series might not be much, but it brings characters to life and makes the players and fans grow to love them, which’ll make us stick around. Keep it up!

title: A great game
text: Subway Surfers is a mobile game that has been popular for years, and for good reason. The game is an endless runner where players control a character who is running away from a grumpy inspector and his dog through the busy streets of different cities around the world. The game's graphics are colorful and eye-catching, with detailed and diverse settings that keep players engaged and entertained. The gameplay is easy to pick up, but also challenging enough to keep players coming back for more. Additionally, Subway Surfers frequently updates its content with new characters, locations, and challenges, ensuring that the game always feels fresh and exciting. Overall, Subway Surfers is a fun and addictive game that is definitely worth checking out.

title: Great game- play it now
text:
Subway surfers is known by so many people. I love it, personally. It influenced many, many other games. It’s just so addicting swiping left, right, and up to jump. It’s just swiping back and forth but it has a deeper meaning than that. It’s avoiding obstacles while also running away from an angry policeman. It’s collecting coins to buy boards and other items. It’s a story in the size of a phone screen. It even has different characters to collect. There are so many places to surf and so many songs to choose from. It is amazing. But anyway, the only slight problem I have is that you have to buy seasonal characters with real money. I propose to have it also be purchasable with the coin equivalent of the real price.    

Play. This. Game.

Other than that awesome game and keep it up.

title: Great game but...
text: I’ve had this game for a long time. A good 7 years at least. I can say that this past week I’ve been top 3 and I’ve aimed to get to number 1 so of course I play a lot. Recently my games however have been lagging and messing me up when I get so far into the game which ticks me off because it takes me awhile to get to a certain point. Not only that but in my most recent game it asked if I wanted to keep Local or Online which it does when I pause the game. Guess what? I unpaused the game and that screen popped up which messed up the game for me. It was upsetting because I had gotten so far and I had to waste my keys. Of course it didn’t matter because my game lagged at the end and messed me up. So now I might just delete it. No point I’m playing a game that I can always guarantee won’t mess up because trust me it has many times already

title: Love the double coin
text:
This game is amazing, I love it! I used to get frustrated because of the costs of the new characters, but after I bought my double coin, that frustration was gone, it cost $4.99 but it’s worth it because I can easily make more then 100k.
It gives me double coin while I’m running and when I get caught I just touch where it says “double coin” and I have the chance to double the coins I got. 
Example: I get 5k in one run, because I have my double coin, I get to double it up to 10k
When I get caught I click the “double coin button” and it will give me the chance to double it up to 20k, easy as that! 🤗
 I am so happy with the game! I want to thank the developer because it has made such a nice game and updates, in this quarantine this game has been my favorite distraction, thank you!

title: Love this game

We have to use keys more now but other than the daily three I might get one from a box or find one in the subway every blue moon. title: A few updates needed
text: Subway Surfers is a great game. I love it I had it last year then accidentally deleted it because it was next to the game I wanted to delete. And now I have it once and for all! I gave this a five star review because the few suggestions that I have for you is not worth taking one star away. So I have kinda mastered the subways obstacles so it is getting a little boring maybe adding a few different ones, just to make the game more challenging. And maybe adding a few skins for the subway that you could buy with coins or something. Also maybe a new power up. I’m just throwing out some ideas for your next update. Um... one complaint is that, the characters r so expensive and I don’t know how to get all those coins. Otherwise this is a great game, a ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ game!

title: Subway service is better than any game in the world

title: No support, and lost progress
text:
I enjoyed this game before all of the ads that they are riddled with now. I was forced to update this game to whatever the new version is and half my progress was lost because it was too easy or I had too many coins for their new challenges. They require you to watch longer ads than normal and this is after I paid them to remove all ads to begin with which isn’t an option anymore. The game itself is fun but not worth starting over. When I went to recover my progress it only accepted the double coins option. Just lousy tech support. They also removed the chance at hitting the jackpot of coins thru the mystery box. That was fun to burn time and every so often it actually worked. Good game, but don’t expect to have saved progress after updates.

Update: I received an automated response that said restoration was underway and then fixed. This is not true, and I am still waiting for a real response let alone solution

title: Good game but...
text: Ok let me get this over with. The graphics are awesome but, it has a few bugs. Every single time a holiday comes up or the season changes they say I have to update the game, and, it gets annoying because this game is getting all weird and I can't play subway surfers until next fall or something like that. And I have seen bad reviews about this game, and I'm am kind of giving a bad review like, I'm complaining about this game. This game is cool but this game is also irritating 😠. I think that if this game isn't gonna let me play then I don't mind writing another review! And trust me, if I do write another review about this game if I can, this review this time is gonna be badder than any review for any game at all. But please stop making people update this game over and over again or else I won't be able to play this game. And the more people who get this game, the more money you get, and you want money, don't you? That's what I thought. Please...NO MORE UPDATES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Awesome game, few suggestions
text: Overall, this game is awesome, but it needs a bit more variety. I understand you have hunts. But you need a little more like add more power ups and rows when you are playing the game. And please lower the prices and don’t make everything that you need real money for. That’s all, awesome game! And I’ve heard that the graphics and layout are very childish, like it’s for a six year old or something, don’t let that get under your skin and hurt you emotionally and mentally. It’s all what comes from the heart ❤️ that counts. Btw, there r SO MANY ADS!!! It gets annoying after a while when u r looking at skins and there is an idiotic ad, I get it that u r supporting other games and apps, but it gets so annoying!!! Again, thx for ur time, bye! 💜💜💚💚

title: Glitch/bug??
text: Hello, I’ve been playing this game for a LONG time. I’ve been constantly playing it everyday, you could say I was addicted. I had a decent amount of coins, a lot of amazing characters and boards. This happened a few months ago, I was joining the game and it was stuck on the loading screen. I thought maybe it was a glitch so I exited out of the game and joined again. Still stuck on the loading screen. Then I thought maybe it needed an update but it didn’t. This happened for over a month now and I finally decided to delete the game. I’ve been wondering if this is just a bug that happened to me or if it happened to anyone else too. But it also happened months ago, so it is probably fixed by now. Overall, it’s a SUPER fun game and I enjoyed it when I could. :)

title: I love this! But..
text: Look, I love this game a lot! Always some new characters, there is always skins you want, and prizes are unpredictable! But, sadly, there are also many flaws. I really want to know if there could be multiplayer higher than 30. This way, it will make even more people want the game! I also do think that the people with names are cool, and show themselves out using Facebook. But for other players that can't do that ( including me ) can't change our names, showing us as " Player " or another demo name. I want all players to be able to change their name, but also have restrictions on order to not have any rude names. So there is my review. I give it a 5 star rating because I played this when I was only 5, and I was obsessed with this. Please hear me out. Thank you.

title: AMAZING🤩🤩🤩🤩
text: I’ve had this game since I was maybe four years old, and I think it’s amazing! I play this game 24/7 I absolutely love the game. With all the cool skins you can be it also sets goals for me. I really want to get the Zoe skin, (The zombie) and it’s 120,000 coins so it actually kind of teaches me to save my coins or money in real life for stuff you really want. So I have about 78,000 coins and I’m so close to the Zoe skin! I’ve also been saving my keys for all her stages! But I think it’s an amazing game! I play the game without buying anything, I haven’t bought any coins or skins with real money. So it’s still really fun without buying stuff. I think that this game is so amazing that people have been making there own versions of it! But if your thinking about getting this game! Don’t have and doubts! This game is so amazing!!

title: Hellooo? This app needs an UPDATE.
text: Look, I know it’s notorious for the developers to only update the app when they change the location and add a new character, BUT that is so ridiculous. This app is so buggy, laggy, and glitchy that I can’t even play. The gameplay is not smooth at all anymore. The trains are laggy and glitchy, so is my character, and EVERYTHING else. Stop only updating the app when it comes to more content and update it when there’s something that needs to be FIXED as well. (Like now, for instance). It’s ridiculous that the fun little challenges to gain new characters are the only thing that bring players back to the app constantly, yet now I can’t even complete the challenge because I can’t handle the glitching and lagging. It’s not only infuriating and completely ruins the experience, but it also gets my character killed. ACTUALLY FIX THE APP and stop working on new content until the problem is solved, then we’ll talk. I want to finish the challenge that I’ve worked so hard to progress in.

title: One prob. 🤗
text: This is really amazing and addictive! But, no matter how loud I turn my iPad up and fiddle with the game settings, I never hear any sound! I’m very upset about that. Also, now I’ve been playing for a while, it is rare that I ever get any keys. Also, some of the characters are really expensive. Can you make a new setting to run around in, I feel like the game can be a little predictable. We should also be able to play as cops and create/ customize our own characters and outfits. One other thing- is the fat cop (🤣😍) chasing the kid because he/she graffitied and vandalized one of the trains? Also I want to be able to play alongside on the same screen with my bestie (spaniellover123). One last thing- it needs more girl characters. Other than that, this a amazing game. Thx for making!

title: It can be better😒🤔😡
text:
Subway surfers is a good game but I think it has so much potential. And idea I have is what if the police officer that chases the character could die, like they could get hit or something. Another idea is what if there was a swat team and instead of regular obstacles it could be swat themed or something . Also something really annoying about this game was that my score was 243,000,000 and I kept going but then the game crashed and I had to start over!!!!!! It took me so much time!!!! I also think that the new characters that fit the theme are wayyy to high. I really want Ramona but her character is 95,000 !! I only have 38,000 and I am struggling . I hoped that all that I have said are considered. 

Thank you for your time and consideration,
From, 
      Anymous person muhahahahahhahah

title: Why subway surfers is the littiest game out there!!
text: I love subway surfers and I have been playing since it came out in 2014! But there are a couple issues that need to be fixed. Like one time I was playing and just has I was about to beat my score of 999,999,998 I HIT A TRAIN!! 💔💔😔 And when I went to watch a ad to revive. The teletubbies theme song started playing. Which I thought was odd considering I had been playing for the last 11 years and have never once seen this ad and two because the last time teletubbies aired was in 2001. 🤔 interesting. The show started and I could exit so I had to sit and watch all 365 episodes until it was over. Idk if this is a glitch in the game or what. But it definitely needs to be fixed.

title: I love Subway Surfers just a few glitches
text: Hey I love this game probably more than I should. I started playing when I was a young kid, now I’m 21 and I still play it. It’s my favorite game and I like the new things that have been added. This world tour has a lot of glitches though. The missions for power-ups wasn’t changing even though I finished them, so I deleted it and redownloaded. Then the missions were good but the hoverboards weren’t working. I don’t know what it is, but something’s off. I’ll continue deleting and redownloading and I’ll update this as I go. Either way I just want it to be fixed so I can play without worries. I love this game and it holds a special place in my heart and life. It’s nostalgic and fun. Just hoping the glitches are fixed 💜

title: Fantastic time killer!
text: i have been playing subway surfer since it came out and still to this day i find myself going back on the game to grind a little more and i never find myself being dissatisfied with my experience, there is plenty of objectives to complete especially if you want to get all of the achievements, or for another example if you’re playing f2p trying to unlock yutani after collecting 500 ufo’s and many other characters that also have unlock reqs. the best feeling is after the long run beating your high score it makes me feel good because i know the time it took to do it. overall i would recommend this game to just about anybody seeing as it is very simple to pick up and have fun on! great job devs!!

title: Reset newly achieved high score that I played for nearly 2 hours
text:
Played the game for 2 hours out of pure boredom, but after claiming my rewards and moving past the rewards screen, an ad loads, then causes the game to not load anything on the start menu ui after it finished and was able to be skipped. Because the nothing would load, the logical instinct to do is to close and reopen the game— which is what I did. And to my shock, and my rewards and my new high score had completely vanished back to what it was before I started binge playing for 2 hours.
This is not the first time this has happened to me, where in game menu elements will not load and prevents further progression for the player to achieve a higher score, or to confirm their new high score onto the leaderboard. Subway Surfers isn’t much of a bad game, but this repeated inconvenience makes me more and more frustrated with the game.
TL;DR, made big progress and lost it due to an ad, causing it to not save. Very disappointed.

title: I absolutely love the game
text: Hi! So I barely ever do reviews but after the experience I’ve had I couldn’t not! I absolutely adore this game and have been playing since I was a kid and recently I have gotten back into it and for a lack of better words back addicted to it- haha well with a new map change there were some bugs I saw and I went to contact a support area and they actually messaged me back! I was so surprised to even get a response and let alone such a detailed and kind response at that! I really do feel like my opinion is valid and that the devs care about their game and players! So thank you again for making a wonderful game that isn’t based on ads and money and also for having such a great response team! Love the game keep it up!

title: Review
text: Okay so here is my review a 3.  I like the game but it’s so addicting.  My five sisters and 4 brothers love it.  So one of my sisters was playing the game okay well we all share a room. And we were playing the game.  And 2 of my siblings lost at the same time.  But they got so mad!! I am the second youngest and then they are my older brother and sister who lost.  And my older brother came into my bed with me and kept playing.  I never said I wanted him to.  But he lost again and he was so mad he peed in my bed.  Then kept playing.  Then everyone thought it was a good idea.  So when everyone of them lost at least once they all came in my bed and just peed.  Then some of them came and slept with me.  And they just kept peeing.  So until that day I do not play this game.
